title: Redd Wood
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A polished, chic restaurant with a voguish vibe and hip playlist coupled with an osteria-styled menu and Napa/Sonoma favored wine list. Located in the North Block Hotel. Vegans try the wood-fired tomato, oregano, garlic and chili (no cheese) pizza. Always one vegan salad and others can me made without cheese. Many pasta dishes & specials available as vegan choices also.
